Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER PROTECTION

Title: Relates to requiring manufacturers of internet-enabled devices to conduct age assurance to determine a user's age category
Summary: Requires manufacturers of internet-enabled devices to conduct age assurance to determine a user's age category and provide all websites, online services, online applications and mobile applications on such user's internet-enabled device and/or application store manufactured by the covered manufacturer with a digital signal that such user is a covered minor as well as the age category of such covered minor via a real-time application programming interface (API).
LawCode: Add Art 45-B §§1540 - 1547, amd §899-ii, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to device-level age assurance
